workspace, but it is closed.

Have a closed project in your workspace
Select a field that is an object in the variables or expression view

Actual test case:
You need a configuration that does not have a project specified (remote or 
local work.
Have a closed project in your workspace
Select a field that is an object in the variables or expression view
